#include<stdio.h>
#define max(a,b) a>b?a:b
//vector<int>adj[];
int ma;
int r,c;
int a[205][205];
void func(int p,int q,int s)
{
    s++;
    ma=max(ma,s);
if(p-1>=0 and a[p-1][q]==s) func(p-1,q,s);
	if(p+1<r and a[p+1][q]==s) func(p+1,q,s);
	if(q-1>=0 and a[p][q-1]==s) func(p,q-1,s);
	if(q+1<c and a[p][q+1]==s) func(p,q+1,s);
	if(q+1<c and p-1>=0 and a[p-1][q+1]==s) func(p-1,q+1,s);
	if(q-1>=0 and p+1<r and a[p+1][q-1]==s) func(p+1,q-1,s);
	if(q+1<c and p+1<r and a[p+1][q+1]==s) func(p+1,q+1,s);
	if(q-1>=0 and p-1>=0 and a[p-1][q-1]==s) func(p-1,q-1,s);
}
int main()
{
int t,i,j;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
//int a[205][205];
scanf("%d",&r);
scanf("%d",&c);
ma=0;
 for(i=0;i<r;i++)
 {
     for(j=0;j<c;j++)
     {
         scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
     }
 }
 int ans;
for(i=0;i<r;i++)
{
    for(j=0;j<c;j++)
    {
        ans=0;
        if(!a[i][j])
        {
            func(i,j,ans);
        }
    }
}
printf("%d\n",ma);
}
return 0;
}
